entry.title: Do not resume bookmark from an activity
entry.content: In one of my applications that uses Workflow Foundation we had a ResumeBookmark call that always resulted in TimeoutException. The cause was that Bookmark resumed immediately after it was created, in the Excecute method of activity. This resulted in WorkflowApplication waiting for workflow to become idle but it couldn't because the activity never ended executing. The problem was solved by moving ResumeBookmark out of activity.
